thread.title: the price of the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra smartphone drops to less than €300
thread.title_full: the price of the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra smartphone drops to less than €300

author: archyde
title: the price of the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra smartphone drops to less than €300
text:
2023-12-28 10:00:35
The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra drops below €300 on Cdiscount. A godsend if you want to change your smartphone before the new year.
Released in 2020, the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra remains a sure value in the smartphone market. It effectively stands out as a high-performance device with unrivaled value for money. On Cdiscount, it is currently available at only €296. An ideal opportunity to get a 5G smartphone without ruining your wallet.
Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra : un smartphone ultra performant
The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra, a powerful smartphone, is powered by the Exynos 990 chip and 12 GB of RAM, offering exceptional performance for browsing, gaming sessions or viewing content on your favorite SVOD platforms. The 6.9-inch AMOLED display, with a resolution of 3200×1440 pixels, provides an immersive visual experience. Featuring 128 GB of storage, this smartphone is also equipped with a 5,000 mAh battery, ensuring up to 18 hours of battery life with an active Internet connection.
In terms of photography, the Galaxy S20 Ultra is equipped with a quadruple rear lens, including a 108-megapixel main sensor, a 12-megapixel ultra-wide-angle module, a 48-megapixel telephoto lens, and a DepthVision camera. On the front, a 40-megapixel camera is dedicated to selfies and video calls. Explore the photographic excellence and cutting-edge performance of the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra, a smartphone that redefines standards in power and imaging.
A prestigious smartphone at a low price
The Galaxy S20 Ultra shines with its exceptional features covering graphics, photos, videos, speed, connectivity, resolution and size. This smartphone offers an unparalleled user experience, enabling smooth execution of everyday tasks and pushing the limits of performance. The exceptional resolution screen offers total immersion, ideal for the most demanding games. Explore your creativity with the camera’s extensive settings, offering endless possibilities for capturing ever more beautiful images

The prices mentioned are indicative and subject to variations. Futura may receive compensation when our readers make a purchase through links included in this article. Your support through these merchant links directly contributes to maintaining our informative content.
